page.title: 06Farm Machinery/Investment
page.content:
The most common{machines}found in the Kinross area are:- combines;round and square balers;3-6 furrow ploughs;harvesters (potato, forage);crop sprayers;cultivators; slurry tankers;dung spreaders;harrows; seeders(grass & barley);potato planters;rotary mowers.
In the Kinross area money is mainly {invested}in new buildings,machinery, seed,fertilisers and drainage.Many farms are building new sheds so that they have more storage space for machinery,crops and cattle in the winter.Machinery has to be replaced or new parts have to be bought;seed and fertilisers are also bought in large quantities.Drainage is also needed to prevent fields from flooding.This is very costly but pays off in the long run.
